text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde nza wo Bakɨme Zisas Krais ga ndɨkndɨgɨp, vhɨra wari won ndavir harigi gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨi tɨva ndɨkndɨgɨri. Mba tɨv, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar, ana nduara mba tɨvar nza mbuim, nza mbui. Gu guigira khueŋ vuzvugi, mba ndɨkndɨk nde ndavi khavɨrim, nde khaŋ tɨgɨv ŋaara mbatɨgar muuŋv, na phorgɨv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv suaŋri. Nde Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv suaŋrim, ana nan kurkurari.
